attributes.action: Stop T.V licence in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Tv licence should be banned because of unfair Financial Burden: A TV license fee imposes a flat charge on households, disproportionately impacting low-income families who may struggle to afford the fee. This creates inequality and forces some to make difficult financial choices for a service they might not even use.
attributes.background: Because I believe that needing to pay the government for you to watch tv is unfair and unnecessary as some families are poorer than others and can't pay for their tv.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701068
